item.description:
When we asked previous NLP workshop participants what topic they would like to see a future workshop on , the overwhelming request was for a course on NLP language patterns. Here you go!

Here are the details:

What: Conversational Mastery - Using NLP Language Patterns
Date: Saturday, October 2, 2010
Time: 11:00am - 7:00pm (Note new time)
Place: Roots & Wings wellness center, 317 N Main St, Natick MA
Tuition: $119

In this full day, experiential (not to mention fun) workshop you will learn how powerful language can be in bringing about lasting change. In the workshop you will learn and use the NLP Meta Model, Milton Model and Sleight of Mouth language patterns to identify and modify limiting belief systems in both yourself and others.

By the end of the workshop, participants will be able to:
• Identify limiting beliefs through language (the NLP Meta-Model)
• Use persuasive language patterns to enable change in yourself and others (the NLP Milton Model)
• Use select advanced language patterns to help generate new beliefs and behaviors in yourself
and others (aka "Sleight of Mouth")

Note: There are a limited number of scholarships and work-study positions available - please inquire if interested.

** Please forward this to anyone who might want to learn more about NLP. **

Feel free to email (adam@NewLightNLP.com) or call (508-454-2261) if you have questions about how this workshop would be useful for you.

Looking forward to seeing you there!
Adam
